snippet: The country musician Marty Stuart released a two-disc set, “Saturday Night/Sunday Morning,” shortly after the publication of “American Ballads,” a book of photographs.
abstract: Country music singer Marty Stuart aims to preserve traditional culture of genre; he has published book American Ballads, featuring his photographs of country music stars and fans, and released his two-disk set Saturday Night/Sunday Morning.
lead_paragraph: The country musician Marty Stuart released a two-disc set, “Saturday Night/Sunday Morning,” shortly after the publication of “American Ballads,” a book of photographs.

headline.seo: Marty Stuart Preserves Country in New Music and Photos
headline.main: Conserving His Roots With Memories and Music
headline.print_headline: Conserving His Roots With Memories and Music

keywords.value: American Ballads: The Photographs of Marty Stuart (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works
